username.description: A unique identifier chosen by the user during signup, utilized for file metadata and logs.

email.description: An email address used to validate the user during signup.

password.description: A salted encryption of the users password.

lastAccessedDateTime.description: The last time the user accessed their account.

lastAccessedIP.description: The IP address from which the user last accessed their account.

file_list.description: A list of file IDs stored in the database.

files.description: A collection of file metadata objects that map to file_list.
